title: What are you?

replies.body:
1. Winter or Summer? Summer
2. Pants or Shorts Shorts
3. Coke or Pepsi Coke
4. Sword or Bow Sword
5. Smarter or Sporty Both
6. Skype or TeamSpeak Skype yo
7. Favourite Sport? Rugbyyyyyyyyyyyyy
8. Favourite Video Game(Excluding Minecraft)? Currently GTA IV (Don't have GTA V). Changes like every month or two so ask me the question in a month or two and it will probably be a different answer :P
9. Favourite Food? Lasagna
10. Favourite Avicus Moment? The reply that I made on the that on the "Post your good old times here thread: https://avicus.net/forums/2135b1cfe?reply=196468
11. Favourite Drink? Cokeeeee

replies.body:
Winter or Summer? Summer.
Pants or Shorts? Depends on the occasion. If it's just general wear, it has to be shorts (Yes I swear them in winter).
Coke or Pepsi? Coke.
Sword or Bow? Sword engagements.
Smarter or Sporty? Sport. I am quite competitive...
Skype or TeamSpeak? Skype.

Favourite Sport? Basketball & Tennis.
Favourite Video Game(Excluding Minecraft)? The Forest or Call of Duty. Smite doesn't fall that far behind. 
Favourite Food? Pasta, preferably ravioli. 
Favourite Avicus Moment? Would have to be back in the Sistahood days. Not to mention being an administrator and making new friends!
Favourite Drink? CUP OF TEA!!!!!

replies.body:
1. Winter or Summer? Summer. Definitely Summer.
2. Pants or Shorts? Shorts, probably. My legs sweat whenever I wear pants the wrong day. xD
3. Coke or Pepsi? Coke. Pepsi's just slightly sweet.
4. Sword or Bow? Bow.
5. Smarter or Sporty? Smarter. You have never seen me go all nerd on you yet :P
6. Skype or TeamSpeak? Skype, only because I got lots of IRL friends I talk to on there as well. Plus, I just do better talking to people 1 on 1 instead of in a huge group, like in TS.

Free Choice:

1. Favorite Sport? Though it's not a major league sport, I'd say crew/rowing. If I had to pick a major league sport, though, I'd go with baseball.
2. Favorite Video Game(Excluding Minecraft)? Warioware: Smooth Moves, Antichamber, or Super Smash Bros. for Wii U.
3. Favorite Food? Lasagna.
4. Favorite Avicus Moment? Finding out I got called back for an interview after submitting my very first staff application.
5. Favorite Drink? Diet Barq's root beer (Need to have diet in order to stay in shape for crew.)
